Class Ticker

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Ticker
  • public class Ticker
extends Entity
    The ticker at the bottom of the screen, it shows 100 companies from BIST in a random order each time the program is started. It also randomly assigns status arrows next of them showing the status. A greem up arrow A red down arrow A gray right arrow

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Draws the company name and the status arrow for the current screen width. It starts drawing from the (-offset, 0). This way we get the sliding text effect. When current company is totally out of view we reset the offset and move to the next company.
        Specified by:
        draw in class Entity
        Parameters:
        g2d - Graphics object on which the drawings are made.

      • update

        public void update()
        Increases the offset variable.
        Specified by:
        update in class Entity
